actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: Recognizing the accomplishments of the U.S. General Services Administration since its creation in 1949 for providing policy leadership and expertly managed space, products, services, and solutions, at the best value, to enable Federal employees to accomplish their missions.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Congratulates the employees of the United States General Services Administration (GSA) for their outstanding efforts on behalf of U.S. taxpayers. Encourages GSA to continue to lead in energy efficiency, efficient workspaces, and sustainable practices and to continue to be a partner with local governments and communities.

titles.title: Recognizing the accomplishments of the U.S. General Services Administration since its creation in 1949 for providing policy leadership and expertly managed space, products, services, and solutions, at the best value, to enable Federal employees to accomplish their missions.
